jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.job_details: Responsible for developing both client and server software. Requires experience with JavaScript, Node.js, and databases.

jobs.title: Graphic Designer
jobs.job_details: Create visual concepts to communicate ideas that inspire, inform, or captivate consumers. Requires proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite.

jobs.title: Front-End Developer
jobs.job_details: Develop the user-facing side of web applications. Requires expertise in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks like React.

jobs.title: Back-End Developer
jobs.job_details: Focus on server-side logic, database management, and integration of front-end elements. Requires knowledge of server-side languages like Python, Ruby, or PHP.

jobs.title: MERN Developer
jobs.job_details: Develop web applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. Requires full-stack development skills.

jobs.title: Software Developer (QA)
jobs.job_details: Ensure the quality of software through automated and manual testing. Requires experience with testing frameworks and tools.

jobs.title: UX/UI Designer
jobs.job_details: Design and enhance user experiences and interfaces for web and mobile applications. Requires strong portfolio demonstrating UX/UI design skills.

jobs.title: Network Engineer
jobs.job_details: Manage and maintain computer networks. Requires knowledge of network protocols, configurations, and security.

jobs.title: Systems Engineer
jobs.job_details: Design, implement, and maintain IT infrastructure. Requires experience with system administration and network configuration.

jobs.title: Sales Associate
jobs.job_details: Handle sales inquiries and customer service remotely. Requires excellent communication and sales skills.
